name: Hoard Hoarderz
description:
You will use the items that you've hoarded over the years to stop a zombie invasion on your home!

Click on a items image to place it down (if you have one to place down)

Go into your home to get pieces of trash to place down by clicking on an item in your home and putting them in the collection box

(The game is inspired by Plants vs Zombies)

(Made for a game jam)
